text: Oraal () is a 2005 Indian Malayalam-language drama film directed by Kukku Surendran, starring Mukesh and Shreya Reddy in the lead roles. http://www.nowrunning.com/movie/2582/malayalam/oraal/index.htm ==Plot== ==Cast== * Mukesh * Anoop Chandran * Krishnan * Raj Kumar * Sriya Reddy * Thara Balachandran ==References== ==External links== * Category:2005 films Category:Indian films Category:2000s Malayalam-language films
title: Oraal
